headline: Blackstone Repositions Portfolio With Urbaser Deal And Larger Anthropic Stake
summary: Blackstone (NYSE:BX), alongside EQT, has agreed to acquire Spain based waste management company Urbaser, expanding its exposure to infrastructure and environmental services. The firm is also increasing its commitment to AI by making a substantial follow on investment in Anthropic, a leading artificial intelligence company. These moves represent changes in Blackstone's portfolio mix and highlight its focus on both essential services and technology. For investors watching Blackstone at a...
